gurps-gridless.keybindings.retreat.name: Retreat

gurps-gridless.settings.outerBorderWidth: Width of the outer border in px.

gurps-gridless.settings.facingAlpha.name: Facing area opacity

gurps-gridless.settings.GURPSMovmentEnab: Enable GURPS tokens shapes and movement on Hex-Grids

Enable GURPS specific movement and hex shapes on hex-Grids. WARNING: This will change token settings on all scenes in this world. Disabling this option will revert the changes. Please disable the setting before removing this module, otherwise the changes will persist.
gurps-gridless.settings.VisionAdjustmetE: Adjusts vision origin for multihex tokens so that the complete token is visible to itself.
gurps-gridless.settings.alwaysShowOuterB: When on, the outer border with the facing colors will be always shown for all visible tokens. When off, it will only be shown for the selected token or on hover (as the inner bortder).
gurps-gridless.settings.showToggleRotaio: Show Toggle Rotation on Movement Button
When on, the Toggle Rotation on Movement Button will be shown in the left toolbar. In order for this setting change to take effect you will need to reload Foundry.
gurps-gridless.settings.facingIndicatorG: Offset of the facing arrow from the token front in grid units.
gurps-gridless.settings.facingIndicatorI: Custom image for the facing arrow. Leave empty to use the default arrow.
gurps-gridless.tokenSettings.tab.name: GURPS Token Shape
gurps-gridless.tokenSettings.explanation: Note from GURPS Token Shape and Movement: Some token properties have been removed from this section and can now be set in the GURPS Token Shape tab.
gurps-gridless.tokenSettings.maxReachSho: Leave empty to use global setting
gurps-gridless.tokenSettings.imageOffset: Shifts the token image forward on positive values and back on negative values relative to the token border
Shifts the token image right on positive values and left on negative values relative to the token border
Will be rounded to full hexes on hex grids. Warnig: There is no usefull shape for tokens with a length of 1 and a width > 1 on hex grids.
gurps-gridless.tokenSettings.tokenLength: Will be rounded to full hexes on hex grids.  Warnig: There is no usefull shape for tokens with a length of 1 and a width > 1 on hex grids.
gurps-gridless.tokenSettings.rotationOff: With this module, the default center of rotation will be the center front hex of the token shape. Use this setting to shift it along the length oft the token. Will be rounded to full hexes on hex grids.

Use this setting to shift the center of rotation along the width oft the token. Will be rounded to full hexes on hex grids. Note that shiftig by a number of hexes not dividable by two will move the border of grid.
gurps-gridless.tokenSettings.facingIndic: Enables the facing arrow if facing arrows are enabeld in the global settings.
Custom facing arrow image. Leave empty to use the default arrow.
